Since long was thinking of creating logo for my site, So finally took move to create one. Here is the first iteration. The color combination is very put around solarized dark because I like that color it.

Logo meaning

<p style="font-size=2em;font-family:times new roman;font-style:italic;text-align:center;">"what we see is code between braces"</p>
